job_title : Medical Science Liaison / Sr MSL - Immunology

Are you a board-certified rheumatologist in India looking to expand your impact within the realm of immunology? Sense7ai Healthcare Division seeks a professional like you for a pivotal role with a prestigious yet confidential US-based client. This contract-based opportunity is focused on transforming patient care by shifting from broad immunosuppression to precision-targeted therapies for immune-mediated diseases, including systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), psoriasis, and uveitis. 
What You Will Do: 

Lead Scientific Dialogues: Engage with top medical and scientific leaders through advanced scientific exchanges. 
Cultivate Partnerships: Identify and establish connections with influential pre-clinical and clinical study investigators. 
Deliver Strategic Insights: Provide strategic insights to enhance the application and value of our client’s innovative treatments. 
Enhance Research and Understanding: Address complex research questions and convey critical clinical and scientific information to enhance the usage and perception of products. 

Who You Are: 

Qualified Rheumatologist: Currently practicing with an active patient base in India and board-certified in rheumatology. 
Experienced in Medical Affairs: At least 2 years of experience in Medical Affairs within the pharmaceutical industry, preferably with a focus on immunology. 
Skilled Communicator: Able to effectively discuss complex scientific data with a diverse audience and contribute to clinical discussions on both regional and national levels. 
Organized and Proactive: Known for excellent organizational, time management, and communication skills. 
Ready to Travel: Prepared to travel frequently to meet with stakeholders and for reporting purposes (50-70% travel). 

Why This Role? 
This position offers a unique opportunity to apply your clinical expertise to influence global innovations in rheumatological treatments from your practice in India. Working through sense7ai as a conduit, your efforts will directly contribute to international advancements in healthcare, significantly impacting patient outcomes worldwide. 
 
Interested in making a global impact through local engagement? Apply now to become a driving force in the future of immunology treatments!


Jd Skills :  Medical Affairs,Clinical Science

Are you a board-certified rheumatologist in India looking to expand your impact within the realm of immunology? This contract-based opportunity is focused on transforming patient care by shifting from broad immunosuppression to precision-targeted therapies for immune-mediated diseases, including systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), psoriasis, and uveitis. 
What You Will Do: 

Lead Scientific Dialogues: Engage with top medical and scientific leaders through advanced scientific exchanges. 
Cultivate Partnerships: Identify and establish connections with influential pre-clinical and clinical study investigators.

Who You Are: 

Qualified Rheumatologist: Currently practicing with an active patient base in India and board-certified in rheumatology. 
Experienced in Medical Affairs: At least 2 years of experience in Medical Affairs within the pharmaceutical industry, preferably with a focus on immunology. 
Skilled Communicator: Able to effectively discuss complex scientific data with a diverse audience and contribute to clinical discussions on both regional and national levels. 
Organized and Proactive: Known for excellent organizational, time management, and communication skills. 
Ready to Travel: Prepared to travel frequently to meet with stakeholders and for reporting purposes (50-70% travel). 

Why This Role? 
This position offers a unique opportunity to apply your clinical expertise to influence global innovations in rheumatological treatments from your practice in India. Working through sense7ai as a conduit, your efforts will directly contribute to international advancements in healthcare, significantly impacting patient outcomes worldwide. 
 
Interested in making a global impact through local engagement? Apply now to become a driving force in the future of immunology treatments!

: Missing Data Imputation Using Kernel Fuzzy C Mean Clustering via Gray Relational Analysis

: Matlab
Domain : Data Mining
Description : Handling the missing values using clustering based multiple imputation method.
People using real-world datasets like industrial and research repeatedly encounter the data imperfection issue in the form of incompleteness. The quality of patterns in data mining depends on the quality of input data. The incomplete data leads to poor quality patterns as result which becomes useless. In this project, missing data imputation method called KCBGMI is proposed to make the database as complete which is the precious quality of good and quality dataset. First the supplied dataset is decomposed into the complete and incomplete instances. Complete datasets are clustered using KFCM (Kernel Fuzzy c Means). And then missing values in each of incomplete datasets are computed using GRA and entropy based multiple imputations. The proposed method is tested with few existing methods in real time UCI-Wine dataset with various missing ratios.
